## BcryptHasher class

BCrypt implementation of the cryptographic hashing service

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BcryptHasher implements IHasher 
```
**Implements:** [IHasher](./auth.ihasher.md)

## Remarks

Uses the bcrypt algorithm with 10 salt rounds for secure password hashing. BCrypt automatically handles salt generation and incorporates it into the hash.
